## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (53c7c9b803756a1ea6a0e69ede3e2b8b65ce1401318b00cb784fdcc997435953)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'miniprogram-project' @ 99.99.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
